segments.text: Hi . I'm looking for a gift for my niece .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , little girls seem to love Barbie dolls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's perfect . I want to see one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are â€” she's called Digital Barbie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I like Digital Barbie ! How much does she cost ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's perfect . Let me have her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good . Is there anything else you would like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , that'll do it for now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Including tax , your total will be $ 32.42 . Cash or charge ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me give you cash , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here's your change and receipt . Thank you .
segments.speaker: S2
